bibl.title: Arsinoe in the Peloponnese: The Ptolemaic Base on the Methana Peninsula.
bibl.note: The Methana peninsula. - The Chremonidean War and the Ptolemaic bases in the southern Aegean. - The Ptolemaic base of Methana (Arsinoe). - Urban life and the new polis of Methana. - Arsinoe and Ptolemy VI Philometor. - Cult. - Agriculture on the peninsula. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement.

bibl.seg: GILL D.W.J., Arsinoe in the Peloponnese: The Ptolemaic Base on the Methana Peninsula.

Thomas SCHNEIDER and Kasia SZPAKOWSKA (Edd.), Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement = Alter Orient und Altes Testament. 347 (MÃ¼nster, 2007) pp. 87-109, 7 figg.

The Methana peninsula. - The Chremonidean War and the Ptolemaic bases in the southern Aegean. - The Ptolemaic base of Methana (Arsinoe). - Urban life and the new polis of Methana. - Arsinoe and Ptolemy VI Philometor. - Cult. - Agriculture on the peninsula. - Conclusion.
